name: Advanced Retirement Planner
description: Professional-grade retirement planning with complete multi-currency integration
author: Yali Pollak (יהלי פולק)
features: Permanent side panel with tabbed navigation
Enhanced chart breakdowns showing all savings components
Complete multi-currency integration (ILS, USD, EUR, GBP, BTC, ETH)
Dynamic form labels with currency symbols
Real-time currency conversion and value updates
RSU stock price integration for 60+ companies
majorChanges: FIXED: Google (GOOGL) stock price updated from $135.25 to accurate $183.00
ENHANCED: Real-time stock price API implementation using Yahoo Finance (CORS-free)
IMPROVED: Monthly Salary fields now clearly specify 'Gross' salary requirement
UPGRADED: Stock price system with graceful fallback from live API to updated hardcoded prices
ENHANCED: 5-minute caching system for API responses to prevent excessive calls
IMPROVED: Detailed logging shows whether stock prices are real-time or fallback
APPLIED: All changes consistent across both original and TypeScript versions
QUALITY: Enhanced user experience with accurate financial data
